items.title: 50 Treasure Token
items.description: Gunakan Treasure Token untuk membuka Bounty yang berisi Star Content, tactician, arena, dan banyak lagi!

items.title: 520 Star Shard + 55 Star Shard Bonus
items.description: Gunakan Star Shard ini untuk menaikkan bintang Little Legend-mu! Semua Star Shard dan penggunaan upgrade-nya tidak dapat di-refund.

items.title: 1040 Star Shard + 160 Star Shard Bonus
items.description: Gunakan Star Shard ini untuk menaikkan bintang Little Legend-mu! Semua Star Shard dan penggunaan upgrade-nya tidak dapat di-refund.

items.title: 130 Star Shard
items.description: Gunakan Star Shard ini untuk menaikkan bintang Little Legend-mu! Semua Star Shard dan penggunaan upgrade-nya tidak dapat di-refund.

items.title: Bundel Boba
items.description: Mencakup Boba Sprite and boom “Boba Blast”.

items.title: Batch of Barons
items.description: Mencakup varian Baron Monsters Attack Eksklusif dan boom 'Smiteback!' Baron.

items.title: Bundel Chibi Janna Pass
items.description: Berisi Chibi Janna, boom “Howling Gale”, emote “Storm's Coming!!!”, dan Cyber City: Phase 1 Pass+.

items.title: Bundel Awalan Cyber City
items.description: Berisi Pulsefire Knife Pup Tier 1, 200 Star Shard, dan emote “Jolly and Jaded”.

items.title: Bundel Chibi Riven Pass
items.description: Bundel ini berisi TFT Cyber City Phase 1 Pass+, Chibi Riven, Boom Blade of the Exile, dan Emote I Challenge You

items.title: Bundel Chibi Kayle Pass
items.description: Berisi Chibi Kayle, boom "Divine Judgment", emote "Bask in My Glory", dan Cyber City: Phase 2 Pass+.

items.title: Bundel Chibi Briar Pass
items.description: Berisi Chibi Briar, boom "Certain Death", dan Cyber City: Phase 2 Pass+.

items.title: Bundel 6th Anniversary
items.description: Berisi Birthday Buddy Cuppy, Cookies 'n' Scream Cuppy dan Cyber City: Phase 2 Pass+.

items.title: Bundel Awalan K.O. Coliseum
items.description: Berisi Kiko, emote "Tempting Spirit", dan 50 Treasure Token.

items.title: Bundel K.O. Coliseum Pass
items.description: Berisi Spirit Blossom Kiko, portal "The Way of the K.O.", emote "The King Disapproves", dan K.O. Coliseum: Part 1 Pass+.

items.title: Bundel Chibi Lillia Pass
items.description: Berisi Chibi Lillia, boom "Watch Out! Eep!", emote "Uwaaah!", dan K.O. Coliseum: Part 1 Pass+.

items.title: Bundel K.O. Coliseum Kai'sa
items.description: Mencakup Chibi Kaisa, boom "Icathian Rain", emote "Please Don't Go!", dan K.O. Coliseum: Part 1 Pass+.

items.title: Pack Guide Ao Shin's Ascent
items.description: Berisi emote "Awakened and Enlightened" dan Guide Ao Shin's Ascent*: "Battle Queen Gwen" dan "Truth Dragon Yasuo" (*eksklusif untuk event ini, dan hanya bisa digunakan sampai event selesai pada 22 Oktober 2025).

items.title: Bundel Mega Ao Shin's Ascent
items.description: Berisi emote "Awakened and Enlightened", Awakened Ao Shin, Sol Harbinger Ao Shin, TFT: K.O. Coliseum: Part 2 Pass+, dan Guide Ao Shin's Ascent*: "Battle Queen Gwen" dan "Truth Dragon Yasuo" (*eksklusif untuk event ini, dan hanya bisa digunakan sampai event selesai pada 22 Oktober 2025).

items.title: Bundel Kapi Pass
items.description: Berisi Spirit Springs Kapi Bintang 1, El Tigre Whisker Bintang 1, 100 Treasure Token, dan K.O. Coliseum: Part 2 Pass+.

items.title: Bundel Awalan K.O. Coliseum 2
items.description: Berisi High Noon Fenroar Bintang 1, 200 Star Shard, emote "Waaaaaah!", dan 50 Treasure Token.

items.title: Bundel Worlds 2025
items.description: Berisi portal "Race to Worlds 2025", boom "Earn Your Legacy", Jetback Blepup Bintang-1, K.O. Coliseum: Part 2 Pass+, emote "Outstanding!", dan 250 Treasure Token.

items.title: Bundel Chibi Yunara Pass
items.description: Berisi Chibi Yunara, boom "Arc of Ruin", dan K.O. Coliseum: Part 2 Pass+.

items.title: Bundel K.O. Coliseum Yone
items.description: Berisi Chibi Yone, Boom "Fate Sealed", "Esports Pengu", Emote "The Unforgotten Shh" dan K.O. Coliseum: Part 2 Pass+.

items.title: Bundel Arcane Pass
items.description: Berisi Chibi Caitlyn, Blue Hair Rio Bintang 1, boom "Ace in the Hole Bintang 1", dan K.O. Coliseum: Part 2 Pass+.

items.title: Bundel Starter Lore & Legends
items.description: Termasuk Artiste Choncc, emote "The God-King Disapproves", dan 50 Treasure Token.

items.title: Bundel Lore & Legends Pass
items.description: Termasuk Darkflight Baron Bintang 1, emote "HA-HA.", dan Lore & Legends: Part 1 Pass+.

items.title: Bundel TPO
items.description: Termasuk Fencing Foilist Pengu Bintang 1, Fabulous Fleur Choncc Bintang 1, 500 Treasure Token, dan Lore & Legends: Part 1 Pass+.

items.title: Bundel Gwen Intro
items.description: Berisi emote "Plushy Huggy" dan 100 Treasure Token.

items.title: Bundel Gwen Fan
items.description: Berisi portal "Gwen's Graceful Gateway", emote "Check This Out", emote "Winning Wink", emote "Plushy Huggy", 1.000 Treasure Token, dan Lore & Legends: Part 1 Pass+.

items.title: Bundel Chibi Gwen
items.description: Berisi Chibi Gwen dan boom "Snip Snip".
